mapper.select: select o.ord_code, o.created_date, v.vdr_name, v.vdr_code, o.req_dlv_date, o.tot_price, o.tot_sup_price, o.tot_vat_price, o.tot_disc, v.credit_price, v.credit_bal_price, o.pay_method, o.status, v.discount from orders o JOIN vender v ON o.vdr_code=v.vdr_code order by o.ord_code desc

SELECT od.ord_dtl_code, od.item_code, i.name, i.price, od.quantity, od.sup_price, od.vat_price, od.tot_price, od.disc_price FROM ordersDetail od left JOIN item i on od.item_code=i.item_code JOIN orders o on o.ord_code=od.ord_code JOIN vender v on o.vdr_code=v.vdr_code WHERE od.ord_code=#{ordCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(ORD_CODE, VDR_CODE, STATUS, CREATED_DATE, PAY_METHOD, TOT_QUANTITY, REQ_DLV_DATE, EMP_ID, COM_ID, TOT_SUP_PRICE, TOT_VAT_PRICE, TOT_DISC, DISCOUNT, TOT_PRICE, QUO_CODE) values(#{ordCode}, #{vdrCode}, #{status}, #{createdDate}, #{payMethod}, #{totQuantity}, #{reqDlvDate}, #{empId}, #{comId}, #{totSupPrice}, #{totVatPrice}, #{totDisc}, #{discount}, #{totPrice}, 'quoCode')

INSERT INTO ordersdetail ( ORD_DTL_CODE, ITEM_CODE, QUANTITY, SUP_PRICE, VAT_PRICE, DISC_PRICE, TOT_PRICE, COM_ID, ORD_CODE ) VALUES ( getNextOrdDtlCode(), #{itemCode}, #{quantity}, #{supPrice}, #{vatPrice}, #{discPrice}, #{totPrice}, #{comId}, #{ordCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERS SET vdr_code = #{vdrCode}, req_dlv_date = #{reqDlvDate}, pay_method = #{payMethod}, update_id = #{updateId}, update_date = sysdate WHERE ord_code = #{ordCode}

UPDATE ORDERSDETAIL SET item_code = #{itemCode}, quantity=#{quantity}, sup_price=#{supPrice}, vat_price=#{vatPrice}, tot_price=#{totPrice}, disc_price=#{discPrice}, com_id=#{comId} WHERE ord_dtl_code = #{ordDtlCode}
